name: FigJam Daily Task Prioritizer (Community)
description:
Originally, our template had 145 Duplicates & 9 Likes. But unfortunately, our template file was deleted due to unknown reasons...


There are certainly times where we have too many tasks on our to-do list or end up spending way more time on unimportant tasks. So I’m happy to share with you an Impact/Effort scale-based daily task prioritizer made in FigJam. Hope it will come in handy for you!


We consider this as a tiny contribution to Figma’s great effort in improving live collaboration.


Feel free to duplicate, edit and make it your own. Hope you guys find this as useful as much as we do :)


If you'd like to get notified when we release more templates like this, feel free to signup to our newsletter below.


Sign up to newsletter


Follow us on Twitter & Instagram.
